title: About us
contents: We are a local community of Python and Data Science enthusiasts. Come join us if you're interested in anything to do with Python, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Analytics and more.
Click learn more below or visit our Meetup group.

title: What is PyData?
contents: PyData is an educational program of NumFOCUS, a nonprofit charity promoting open practices in research, data, and scientific computing. It provides a forum for the international community of users and developers of data analysis tools to share ideas and learn from each other.

title: Join Our Events
contents: We host many events throughout the year, from technical talks and workshops to casual meetups. Our events cover diverse topics in Python, data science, and machine learning, catering to all skill levels.
